patthana22.29:4.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭigho nasappaccayo dhammo anidassanaappaṭighassa sappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana22.29:5.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nasanidassanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho sanidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.29:5.3: Hetuyā pañca, adhipatiyā pañca … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana22.29:6.1: Naanidassanaappaṭigho nanasanidassano dhammo anidassanaappaṭighassa nasanidassanassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana22.29:6.3: Ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā upanissaye purejāte atthiyā avigate tīṇi.
patthana22.29:7.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho sappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.29:7.3: Hetuyā nava, adhipatiyā nava … pe … aññamaññe tīṇi … pe … avigate nava.
patthana22.29:8.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.29:8.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana22.29:9.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ narūpiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho rūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.29:9.3: Hetuyā ekavīsa, adhipatiyā ekavīsa … pe … aññamaññe tīṇi … pe … avigate ekavīsa.
patthana22.29:10.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naarūpiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho arūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.29:11.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nalokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
patthana22.29:12.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nalokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.29:13.1: Naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nalokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanasappaṭigho lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
patthana22.29:14.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nalokiyañca naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nalokiyañca dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
patthana22.29:14.4: Hetuyā ekavīsa, adhipatiyā ekavīsa … pe … avigate ekavīsa.
patthana22.29:15.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nalokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.29:16.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nakenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho kenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.29:16.3: Hetuyā pañcatiṃsa, ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … aññamaññe pannarasa … pe … avigate pañcatiṃsa.
patthana22.29:17.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nanakenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho nakenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.29:17.3: Hetuyā pañcatiṃsa, ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … aññamaññe pannarasa … pe … avigate pañcatiṃsa.
